segments.text: How good are you at sports , Bill ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you kidding ? I ’ m terrible ! But I love to watch sports . I go to football or baseball games a lot . And I read sports magazines every week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , yes . I like to exercise . But I don ’ t watch sports or buy sports magazines . I don ’ t have much time to do those things .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I see . You know , we spend time doing different sports . How much time do you spend exercising ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I guess I exercise about two hours a day . I do aerobics three times a week , and the other days I play badminton 1 with my husband . I always feel good afterward .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s great ! I ’ Ve heard people say that before .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , why don ’ t you try to get some exercise ? It ’ s difficult , but very rewarding .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I ’ m too lazy to play sports , and I ’ m not good at anything either . It hardly excites me .
